author: etzovara
body:
#### PR description:

This PR summarises the changes that need to be included to the [cmssw/DQMOffline/JetMET/](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/tree/master/DQMOffline/JetMET) framework in order to include the offline DQM of Scouting jets.


#### PR validation:

The changes have been tested locally producing the expected output.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This PR is related to the draft pull request: [#47116](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47116), but that version needed rebase

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: Developing offline JetMET DQM for Scouting jets -  CMSSW_15_0_0_pre1
